text: i could run the peer, member service and REST API, now is that only end point returns json response? or is there any UI application to experience the blockchain-explorer?
<@U3N0GM3S7> The blockchain explorer is a UI application
<@U3N0GM3S7>  here is the gerrit url git clone <http://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/blockchain-explorer>
explorer_1 is the folder where the explorer UI is. README.md should have most of the info.  You might have to pay special attention to REST port setup.
Change the port to appropriate REST hyperledger port you have set
